//notes: even though the CAD design in source has a stated total volume, we calculate volume locally based on dimensions due to length based on an actual tablet in use in the mod

notes: width and height acquired from width and height of CAD-designed tablet multiplied by the ratio of length of Augmentin tablet (20 mm) to length of CAD-designed tablet (22.23 mm)

//notes: vomiting is one of the possible side effects
noted to increase likelihood of headaches
description: An off-white oval tablet with a popular extended-spectrum antibiotic; product of GSK.  On one side,  "AUGMENTIN" is imprinted; on the other, "500 / 125", indicating the dosage of its two components: amoxicillin (500 mg) and clavulanic acid (125 mg).  Has a moderate effect on bacterial infections.  One dose lasts 12 hours.
